text: Egha azenir mamɨn, Hosia gumazir maba amangizɨ, me Isipɨn Atrivim So bagha ghuegha an azai, eghtɨ a Hosian akuragham. Egha uaghan azenir kamɨn, Hosia azenibar zurara ami moghɨn, a Salmaneser bagha takisɨn mɨn dagɨaba amadir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Salmaneser kamaghɨn fo, Hosia a gifaragha uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim abɨki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan mɨdorozir gumaziba amangizɨ me ghua, Hosian suiragha kalabus gatɨ.
